title: MontPythonn
author: MontPythonn
content: Get now your Airbnb discount up to 75%.How does it work?1.You decide the dates and the place. 2.I let you know the price3.Pay in crypto4.Booking is made on my accounts and you are added as second guest.Enjoy your holiday.My fee is 10% of the final price, minimum 20 euro.tg: https://t.me/Monthypytonrules:escrow accepted only for bookings over 1500 euro (final price).in case the host cancels the booking, the refund is done -10% (from the ammount refunded).in case the host is fake, the refund is done -20% (from the ammount refunded) or another booking same price.in the case you change your mind, the refund is done based on the policy of the host -10% (from the ammount refunded).payments are only in BTC/XMR/USDTprices of bookings may differ from 25% to 75% discountthe refund policy is not negotiable.
